dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mills (for himself and Mr. Hern) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit funding for the Government of Ukraine for the nationalization of strategic assets.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Prohibiting Nationalization of American Companies and Investments Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition on use of funds by the Government of Ukraine for the nationalization of United States assets
section.text: No amounts appropriated or otherwise made available by a law enacted before, on, or after the date of the enactment of this Act, may be used by the Government of Ukraine for the nationalization, expropriation, forced liquidation, seizure, or imposition of any restrictions on shareholders rights to execute governance over, assets or property in Ukraine that is owned directly or indirectly by United States investors, including shareholder interests in any publicly traded company.
